CustomField.description: Created for story BIZ-45146 To updated product related approver
CustomField.formula: IF(OR((D_b__c = true),(S_pfr__c = true),( On_Prem_Multi_year_product__c= true),(Has_Trial_Product__c = true) ,ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type__c, 'Contract Replacement'),(Repstor__c = true),(Legacy_Repstor_Agreement__c=true),(Repstor_Retro__c=true),(Partner_Related__c=true),(Cloud_Migration__c = true)),11,IF(On_Prem__c = true,3,0))
CustomField.label: Product level
